data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_u6tNV4bP0YQ7kNvgFdqJF5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCDrPKV1-7wCwzyO-gWG-AbLq6lMlO254joajhyeP9ltg&oe=66DD9E8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vIdwf36RqQ8Q7kNvgEYcd9H&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCJwaVFHx7c-rb8tMKC0zJKAaldpa0wiXQPBQNbb204ig&oe=66DD9C9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=a8-E4uLIX-QQ7kNvgFeqcUy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD60yZuSPVot0Si89M5sf-J7CWhoc83KMAzmko1KE2KHg&oe=66DD81F1)
